targets.expr:
sum(
  max by (compute_host, resource) (
    cortex_vmware_host_capacity_available{
      resource="cpu",
      availability_zone=~"$availability_zone",
      compute_host=~"$compute_host",
      workload_type=~"$workload_type",
      cpu_architecture=~"$cpu_architecture",
      enabled=~"$enabled",
      decommissioned="false",
      external_customer=~"$external_customer",
    }
  )
)

sum(
  max by (compute_host) (
    cortex_vmware_host_capacity_total{
      resource="cpu",
      availability_zone=~"$availability_zone",
      compute_host=~"$compute_host",
      workload_type=~"$workload_type",
      cpu_architecture=~"$cpu_architecture",
      enabled=~"$enabled",
      decommissioned="false",
      external_customer=~"$external_customer",
    }
  )
)

predict_linear(
  sum(
    max by (compute_host) (
      cortex_vmware_host_capacity_available{
        resource="cpu",
        availability_zone=~"$availability_zone",
        compute_host=~"$compute_host",
        workload_type=~"$workload_type",
        cpu_architecture=~"$cpu_architecture",
        enabled=~"$enabled",
        decommissioned="false",
        external_customer=~"$external_customer",
      }
    )
  )
[56d:4h], 4838400)

# Add all column names here
max by (compute_host, disabled_reason, workload_type, availability_zone, cpu_architecture, enabled, external_customer, decommissioned) (cortex_vmware_host_capacity_available{resource="cpu", availability_zone=~"$availability_zone", compute_host=~"$compute_host", workload_type=~"$workload_type", cpu_architecture=~"$cpu_architecture",  enabled=~"$enabled", decommissioned=~"$decommissioned", external_customer=~"$external_customer"})

max by (compute_host) (cortex_vmware_host_capacity_available{resource="ram", availability_zone=~"$availability_zone", compute_host=~"$compute_host", workload_type=~"$workload_type", cpu_architecture=~"$cpu_architecture",  enabled=~"$enabled", decommissioned=~"$decommissioned", external_customer=~"$external_customer"})

max by (compute_host) (cortex_vmware_host_capacity_available{resource="disk", availability_zone=~"$availability_zone", compute_host=~"$compute_host", workload_type=~"$workload_type", cpu_architecture=~"$cpu_architecture",  enabled=~"$enabled", decommissioned=~"$decommissioned", external_customer=~"$external_customer"})

max by (compute_host) (cortex_vmware_host_capacity_total{resource="cpu", availability_zone=~"$availability_zone", compute_host=~"$compute_host", workload_type=~"$workload_type", cpu_architecture=~"$cpu_architecture",  enabled=~"$enabled", decommissioned=~"$decommissioned", external_customer=~"$external_customer"})

max by (compute_host) (cortex_vmware_host_capacity_total{resource="ram", availability_zone=~"$availability_zone", compute_host=~"$compute_host", workload_type=~"$workload_type", cpu_architecture=~"$cpu_architecture",  enabled=~"$enabled", decommissioned=~"$decommissioned", external_customer=~"$external_customer"})

max by (compute_host) (cortex_vmware_host_capacity_total{resource="disk", availability_zone=~"$availability_zone", compute_host=~"$compute_host", workload_type=~"$workload_type", cpu_architecture=~"$cpu_architecture",  enabled=~"$enabled", decommissioned=~"$decommissioned", external_customer=~"$external_customer"})

max by (compute_host) (cortex_sap_running_vms_per_host{availability_zone=~"$availability_zone", compute_host=~"$compute_host", workload_type=~"$workload_type", cpu_architecture=~"$cpu_architecture",  enabled=~"$enabled", decommissioned=~"$decommissioned", external_customer=~"$external_customer"})

max by (compute_host) (
  cortex_vmware_host_capacity_available{
    resource="cpu",
    availability_zone=~"$availability_zone",
    compute_host=~"$compute_host",
    workload_type=~"$workload_type",
    cpu_architecture=~"$cpu_architecture",
    enabled=~"$enabled",
    decommissioned=~"$decommissioned",
    external_customer=~"$external_customer",
  }
) 
/
max by (compute_host) (
  cortex_vmware_host_capacity_total{
    resource="cpu",
    availability_zone=~"$availability_zone",
    compute_host=~"$compute_host",
    workload_type=~"$workload_type",
    cpu_architecture=~"$cpu_architecture",
        enabled=~"$enabled",
    decommissioned=~"$decommissioned",
    external_customer=~"$external_customer",
      }
) * 100
